fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: Company law, corporate governance, financial services,  taxation , competition, digital agenda
organisation_name: Associazione fra le società italiane per azioni (ASSONIME)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: Assonime - Association of Joint Stock Companies incorporated in Italy – is a long-established business association and think-tank set up by companies in different branches of activity (industry, finance, services and public utilities). Its mission is:1. to contribute to the set-up of a regulatory framework encouraging economic activity through contacts with national and European institutions; 2. to interpret, adapt and apply rules for a well-functioning market; 3. to help members in conforming to the rules. To this end, Assonime maintains a constant dialogue with the main Italian and European institutions as well as its sister organizations in other European countries and regularly organizes public conferences and scholarly seminars, research initiatives and contacts with the national and academic community so as to mobilize the best expertise.
